body.p: A Kentucky merchant and postmaster. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Jane Davison Cooper (died 1845). Father of Sallie Cooper and Josephine Cooper. Served as postmaster of Hawesville, Kentucky from November 1851 to August 1855, June 1861 to July 1862, December 1862 to July 1870, and March 1872 to September 1872.
